titleStmt.title: An act for setling the militia for the borough of Southwark, and parishes adjacent. Thursday, July 14. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this act be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St. Nicholas Clerk of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field and Henry Hills, printers to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleet-street, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Title ornament; initial letter, some text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleet-street, over against Dunstans Church
